data.title: 以至少 50 个字回答问题
data.content: "A diverse workplace includes employees with many different backgrounds (ethnic, cultural, religious, etc.). Describe some of the benefits of diversity in the workplace."
data.answer: Diversity in the workplace has launched a heated debate in today’s society. It is an indisputable fact that diversity can bring a number of benefits to the workplace. First of all, such diversity can potentially ameliorate the overall performance of the company. That is to say when employees are coming from different backgrounds working in collaboration, the likelihood of coming up with more creative ideas, and hence achieving better outcomes will be significantly increased. Besides that, workplace diversity can eliminate discrimination against others, such as people with dark skin. To sum up, it would be great to have workers from various backgrounds in the workplace. （107 字）
